result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Affidavit for Services Rendered filed by Dr. Roland Manos.
Filed by Dr. Roland Manos.
Defendant Andrea A Ford in court with attorney Adam J. Schleis.  Stephen Joseph Centinario appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Dismissed and Read-in to: 16CM557.

From Dr. Roland Manos dated 11/8/16 requesting to be release from order for competency evaluation, defendant has failed to appear for multiple appointments.
Reviewed by Judge Aprahamian 11/8/16; Schedule prompt hearing.
Review hearing on November 28, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

Attorney Adam J. Schleis in court.   Defendant Andrea A Ford did not appear.   Michele W. Hulgaard appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Attorney Schleis advises the Court the Defendant is on her way to court and that she is scheduled for an evaluation on 10/17/16.  The Court will recall the case once the defendant arrives at court.  The Court recalls the case.   The Defendant appears in person.  The Court waives Attorney Schleis appearance.  The Defendant confirms she has an appointment to be evaluated on 10/17/16.  The Court schedules a review hearing to review report that is to be filed by Dr. Manos.

ADDRESS INFO for Andrea A Ford

Prior: 3571 N. 18th St., Milwaukee, WI 53206 United States

From Roland Manos dated 9/27/16 re inability to connect with defendant for evaluation.
Reviewed by Judge Aprahamian 9/28/16.
For Exam Under 971.16 to be prepared by Dr. Roland Manos signed by Judge Aprahamian on 9/8/16.

Attorney Adam J. Schleis in court.   Defendant Andrea A Ford did not appear.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The Defendant's appearance is waived.   Attorney Schleis advises the Court that the Defendant wishes to to change her plea to not guilty be reason of mental defect or disease.  Attorney Schleis requests the Court order an exam be conducted and appoint Dr. Roland Manos to prepare the report.  The Court orders that a report be prepared and filed with the Court prior to the jury status hearing.  The Court to review the report at the jury status hearing.
State's Demand for Discovery and Inspection and Notice of Intent to Use Defendant's Statement and DNA Evidence. Witness list attached.
Hearing on September 8, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Jury status hearing scheduled for October 13, 2016 at 10:30 am.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for October 18, 2016 at 08:15 am.
Hearing on August 16, 2016 at 08:15 am.
Hearing on August 11, 2016 at 09:30 am.

From Atty Schleis dated 3/23/16 requesting adjournment of hearing on 4/25/16.
Hearing on April 25, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Andrea A Ford in court.  Shawn N Woller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. The Defendant has applied at the public defender's office but has not received a response.  The Defendant is to go in person to the public defender's office and return back to court.  The Court recalls the case with the same appearances.  The Defendant was unable to locate the facility. The Defendant is apply at the Public Defender's office following Court today.  The Court sets the matter out 30 days to check status of attorney.  Hearing scheduled for April 25, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Bail Jumping on Milwaukee County Case 15CM962

Defendant Andrea A Ford not in court.  Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant did not appear, case was set for 9:00, case was called at 9:23 a.m.  Based on defendant's non appearance, Court orders bail be revoked and forfieted.  Court issues capias.
Hearing at 01-27-2016 09:00 am

Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness and Family Video and Marco's Pizza listed in the Criminal Complaint.  Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.

Defendant Andrea A Ford in court, in custody.  Susan L. Opper appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court advises of right to an attorney.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
